title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 95.5 - Use of ticket
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 95.5 - Use of ticket

State Regulations

The tax applies to the admission price of all tickets sold
or otherwise disposed of, regardless of whether or not such tickets are used by
the purchasers, and no refund, credit or deduction is allowable by reason of
the non-use of any such ticket unless, for reasons satisfactory to the

Department of Taxation and Finance, the admission price and the tax collected
thereon by the licensee are refunded by the licensee to the
purchaser. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
95.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
